Class Algorithmic

  • java.lang.Object
    • MMC.Composition
      • MMC.Algorithmic

  • public class Algorithmic
extends Composition
    Author:
    andreas This class extends the class Composition.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Algorithmic()
      this constructs a composition in algorithmic mode and without to specified any elements
      Algorithmic(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String comp_name)
      this constructs a composition in algorithmic mode and specified the path and the composition name
      Algorithmic(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String comp_name, java.lang.String composer)
      this constructs a composition in algorithmic mode and specified the path , the composition name and the composer's name
